Apple pie is an excellent dessert for family andfestive table. The process of its preparation is not difficult. You can bake this dessert according to the original or classic recipe. How to cook an apple pie based on them, is described further. Classic apple pie recipe Make apple pie according to the classic recipe is very simple. Pre-required to stock up the following ingredients: chicken eggs - 5 pcs .; wheat flour - 300 g; citric acid - a pinch; granulated sugar - 1 glass; apples - 2-3 pcs. Please note that for charlotte betteruse sour-sweet fruits that do not differ in excessive juiciness. Then the baking will not be wet and will exceed your expectations. This dessert is prepared as follows: Wash apples under running water. Cut them into thin slices, so that they are subsequently well baked. Then transfer them to a bowl of water, where add a little citric acid. Make the dough. Take the eggs and beat them with a mixer. Then start to add a little sugar. It is necessary that these ingredients, after whipping, increase in volume approximately three times. Then start adding flour, while mixing the dough already with the use of a spoon, and put the mixer aside. Take a baking dish, cover with parchmentand sprinkle it with a little flour. Then put the apples in it and fill it with a ready-made dough. Put it all in a preheated oven for 200 minutes for 20 minutes. After that, the pie with apples will be ready, it will only have to cool, cut into small portions and serve to the table.
Ingredients: 360 g butter - 500 g flour - 1 egg yolk - ½ tsp salt - 120 g sugar - 60 ml water

Cut some of butter into large pieces and add to a stand mixer with most of flour, egg yolk, salt, and sugar. Beat for approx. 2 – 3 min. until crumbly. Then, slowly add water, reserving a small amount for the final step, and continue to beat for another 1 – 2 min. until dough is smooth and uniform in consistency. Wrap dough in plastic wrap and transfer to refrigerator. Allow to set for approx. 1 h.
Preheat oven to 180°C/350°F. Cut dough into two even rounds. Then, flour work surface, place dough on top, and roll out, one at a time, using a rolling pin until rounds are larger than your pie dish.

Flour both sides of dough and transfer to pie dish. Press evenly into all edges of dish and then remove excess dough. Place a piece of parchment paper on top of dish and fill with pie weights. Place in preheated oven at 180°C/350°F and blind bake for approx. 10 min.
Peel, core, and quarter apples. Then, cut crosswise into medallion-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, thoroughly mix together apple, lemon juice, cinnamon, nutmeg, flour, sugar, and brown sugar.

Transfer apple slices to pie dish and spread out evenly. Cut remainder of butter into pieces and place on top of apples. Cover pie with rest of dough. Make a small hole in the middle, so air can escape. Mix together egg white and water and brush on top. Return to oven and bake at 180°C/350°F for approx. 50 – 55 min. until golden brown. Enjoy!
